name: Dino Paint
description:
UPDATE 

Previous paint brush bug has been fixed!

Did you know..?

Scientists don't know what colors the dinosaurs had. Can you imagine what they looked like?

¿Sabes que...?

Los cientificos no saben que colores tenian los dinosaurios. ¿ Te imaginas como se veian?

Le saviez-vous...?

Les scientifiques ne savent pas de quelle couleur etaient les dinosaures. Pouvez-vous imaginer a quoi ils ressemblaient?

In Dino Paint you get to create your own color coating for dinosaurs. It's a creative 3D game for children age 3-6.  This project was created for the Dino Jam in september 2021 by Lina Lundstedt. The music is by Jorge Adorni
